inclusion.criterion: They will begin taking iron supplementation for a maximum of 30 days prior to admission.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Girls weighing ≤ 36 kg will take one 300-325 mg tablet oral ferrous gluconate daily
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Inpatient Admission: The subject will be admitted to the CRU, or alternate UVA hospital unit, at 0900-1000 h.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A urine pregnancy test (HCG) will be obtained.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: A hemoglobin will be measured-if a CBC has not been done within the past 7 days, a fingerstick will be done to check the hemoglobin prior to insertion of the IV line.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: An IV line will be placed in a forearm vein at ~1000-1030 h, and blood draws will begin at 1100 h.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Samples will be taken every 10 min for 20 h (i.e., from 1100 h to 0700 h the following day).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects will take 5-25 mg oral micronized P (based on body weight, to achieve mean plasma P 1-2 ng/ml) or placebo at 1100, 1500, and 1900 h.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Formal lights out will occur at 2300 h, and subjects will be encouraged to sleep at this time. Subjects will be awakened at 0700 h.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: During blood sampling, activity (e.g., awake, sleeping) will be recorded by the nurse every 10 minutes.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects will be fasting from 2100 to 0700 h. The subject will be offered meals at standard meal times the evening prior to study, but breakfast will not be served until after the 0700 h sample is obtained.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Optional Follow-Up for study participants: Subjects participating in this study will be asked to respond to a questionnaire (sent via electronic mail or US postal service) and/or phone calls at 6-12 month intervals during the subsequent three years.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to comprehend what will be done during the study or why it will be done
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She is complaining of sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
